full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Telemedicine Services for Environment and Climate Change Canada

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Title**: Telemedicine Services for Environment and Climate Change Canada - Eureka Weather Station, Nunavut
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000058546
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-09-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-08-31
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Procurement Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking proposals for the provision of telemedicine services, prescription drugs, and medical equipment for personnel residing at the ECCC Eureka Weather Station, Eureka, Nunavut. The contract is expected to commence on September 1, 2024, and conclude on August 31, 2027. The option to extend the contract for two additional one-year periods is possible.

## Security Requirements

The procurement includes a security requirement associated with the provision of telemedicine services. Bidders are advised to consult Part 6 of the bid solicitation for additional information on security requirements.

## Trade Agreements and Inuit Benefits Plan

This procurement is subject to the Agreement Between the Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and Her Majesty the Queen in Right of Canada (the Nunavut Agreement). Bidders are requested to maximize Inuit employment, subcontracting, and on-the-job training opportunities under the resulting contract.

## Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria

This procurement will be conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The selection criteria will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:
Garvin Suepaul
Environment and Climate Change Canada
(613) 295-4823
garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca

## Documents

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal and Amendment 001, can be accessed via the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32874/5000058546-rfp---telemedicine-services-%28en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32874/5000058546-rfp---amendment-001.pdf
